title: A Chance Encounter

replies.body: This is fantastic. Great crafting of the scene, and it feels like you've captured the essence of who Ahri and Yasuo are - just from their dialogue as well as the insight from Yasuo's POV. I really enjoyed reading this.
Thank you! It's heartening to hear that I've managed to keep them in character - that was my biggest worry.

Word Count: 1,495

This story is, amongst other things, an attempt to blend the old lore (where the League of Legends and the Institute of War were a thing) with the new lore (where they aren't). 

As a Wood 7 excuse for an Ahri main, and someone who _wants_ to main Yasuo but knows he will turn out exactly like the Yasuo mains everyone complains about, this is the closest I can come to doing some of my favourite characters (and champions) justice - so I hope I have!
